EmailTemplate.name: 11-01-21 HOS VitalCast Migration.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Migration of NCR Vitalcast to Microsoft Azure - Delayed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Migration and Decommission of VitalCast in the NCR Data Center {{lead.First Name:default=Dear Valued NCR Customer}}: Our previously communicated migration for VitalCast, to occur in two phases on Monday, November 1, and Thursday, November 4 been delayed. A new date will be provided in a future communication. We appreciate your partnership with NCR. Thank you, NCR Hosted Services Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
